Wisdom: أَدْيَنُ النَّاسِ مَنْ لَمْ تُفْسِدِ الشَّهْوَةُ دِينَهُ
enWisdom: The most religious of all people is one whose religiosity is not corrupted by [lustful] desire

Wisdom: مَا أَوْهَنَ الدِّينَ كَتَرْكِ إِقَامَةِ دِينِ اللَّهِ وَتَضْيِيعِ الْفَرَائِضِ
enWisdom: Nothing undermines religion like abandoning the upholding of Allah’s religion and neglecting the obligatory [actions]

Wisdom: أَصْلُ الدِّينِ أَدَاءُ الْأَمَانَةِ وَالْوَفَاءُ بِالْعُهُودِ
enWisdom: The foundation of religion is returning trusts [to their owners] and fulfilling pledges
The cornerstone of religion is acquiring good deeds
